org.zaproxy.zap

Interface PersistentConnectionListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ArrangeableProxyListener

    public interface PersistentConnectionListener
extends ArrangeableProxyListener
    Proxy listener that targets long living connections, such as WebSockets or Server-Sent Events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean onHandshakeResponse(HttpMessage httpMessage, Socket inSocket, ZapGetMethod method)
      Allows to keep the connection open and perform advanced operations on the Socket.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.parosproxy.paros.core.proxy.ArrangeableProxyListener

        getArrangeableListenerOrder

    • Method Detail

      • onHandshakeResponse

        boolean onHandshakeResponse(HttpMessage httpMessage,
                          Socket inSocket,
                          ZapGetMethod method)
        Allows to keep the connection open and perform advanced operations on the Socket. Consider WebSocket connections or Server-Sent Events.
        Parameters:
        httpMessage - Contains request and response.
        inSocket - Contains TCP connection to browser.
        method - May contain TCP connection to server.
        Returns:
        True if connection is took over, false if not interested.
